title: The Girl Who Stayed at Home

sources.title: The Girl Who Stayed at Home
The Girl Who Stayed at Home (1919) Drama, War, Romance Silent Film
sources.description:
When Ralph Grey visits France with his father, a shipbuilder, he falls in love with Blossom, the granddaughter of his father's friend, a Civil war veteran not reconciled with the Union.

Director: D.W. Griffith
Writers: D.W. Griffith, Stanner E.V. Taylor
Stars: Adolph Lestina, Carol Dempster, Frances Parks
Genre:  Classics, Cult Film,Family, Drama, War, Romance

metadata.Plot: Story of two brothers who go off to France to fight in World War I, the women who love them and an American expatriate living in France who rallies behind his former country.
metadata.Actors: Adolph Lestina, Carol Dempster, Frances Parks
